message: 🎯 Problem-solving enthusiast: Every bug is just a puzzle waiting to be solved!
all_messages: 🎯 Problem-solving enthusiast: Every bug is just a puzzle waiting to be solved!
🚀 Remember: Premature optimization is the root of all evil. Make it work first!
🔍 The term 'bug' was popularized by Grace Hopper in 1947!
